Weymouth_Town.Quincy Mosque:
Quincy Mosque, founded 1963, is situated in Quincy, Massachusetts in the Quincy Point neighborhood by Lebanese workers in the area's shipyards.


== History ==
Between 1875 and 1912, seven Arab families immigrated to the Quincy area to escape the Ottoman Empire forming the basis of the Muslim community. In 1937, the Arab-American community created the Arab American Banner Society to promote Arab unity and cohesion as well as to champion American ideals.
